price: Dájúdájú àwọn àlùjànnú lérò gẹ́gẹ́ bí ẹ̀yin ènìyàn náà ṣe lérò pé, Allāhu kò níí gbé ẹnì kan kan dìde (lẹ́yìn ikú).
arabic: وَأَنَّهُمۡ ظَنُّواْ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمۡ أَن لَّن يَبۡعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-annahum ẓannū kamā ẓanantum an lan yabʿatha al-lahu aḥadan
